content: This section is only available in the desktop version

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message indicating that certain content is only available in the desktop version. It is displayed on a component (BreakpointWarning) when specific conditions are met, such as being in a small window or having mobile availability disabled.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'هذا القسم متاح فقط في إصدار أجهزة الحاسوب' is a literal translation and while understandable, it lacks the natural flow of Arabic. It's a bit clunky and doesn't convey the intended meaning as smoothly as it could.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هذا القسم متوفر فقط في تطبيق سطح المكتب.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Този раздел е наличен само в десктоп версия' is a literal translation that isn't as natural in Bulgarian. While understandable, it's not the most fluent way to convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Този раздел е достъпен само в настолната версия.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Այս բաժինը հասանելի է միայն աշխատասեղանի տարբերակով" is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning. It translates to 'This section is available only with the desktop version' which sounds awkward. A more natural Armenian translation would better convey the meaning of 'This feature is only available on the desktop version'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այս հնարավորությունը հասանելի է միայն աշխատասեղանի տարբերակում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dana sekcja jest dostępna wyłącznie w wersji na komputery stacjonarne' while understandable, is not the most natural or idiomatic Polish. 'Dana' is archaic and not commonly used in this context. It translates to 'given' or 'this' but sounds awkward here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ta sekcja jest dostępna wyłącznie w wersji na komputery stacjonarne

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙම කොටස වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ පමණක් තිබේ' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'This section is only available in the desktop version'. A more accurate translation would emphasize 'only' or 'exclusively'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කොටස පරිගණක අනුවාදයට පමණක් అందుబాటులో ఉంది (This section is only available for the computer version).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing ' වැඩතල අනුවාදයේ පමණක් තිබේ' is slightly awkward in Sinhala. While grammatically understandable, it could be improved for natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කොටස පරිගණක අනුවාදයට පමණක් అందుబాటులో ఉంది.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the redundant phrase '版本'. It's implied by '桌面端'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 该部分仅可在桌面端使用
